hotels.title: Sophisticated South Korea Alpine Retreat in Alpensia Winter Olympic Resort Town
hotels.description: Discover alpine serenity in the heart of South Korea’s spectacular Taebaek Mountains with a serene stay at InterContinental Alpensia Pyeongchang Resort, an IHG Hotel. The site of 2018's Winter Olympics, Alpensia resort town’s dazzling entertainment and dining options guarantee the ultimate ski escape. Enjoy intimate dining at Oxy Lounge, golfing at Alpensia 700 Golf Club or savour time spent wandering through the beautiful Sol Seom gardens.
